LanguageData.FirstSummerWarning:
Summer has begun! But winter is coming.

Your food crops won't grow in the winter cold. Be sure to store several days' worth of food now, while you still can.

You can build a walk-in refrigeration room to prevent food from spoiling.

And try to buy, steal, or make some parkas, or you'll freeze when you step outside.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenDown: Relations with {0} have broken down. They are now hostile to you.
LanguageData.RelationsWarmed: Relations have with {0} have warmed. They are no longer hostile to you.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenCapture: Because you captured {0}, {1} is now your enemy.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitRain: A {0} has short-circuited in the rain and started a fire.
LanguageData.AreaRevealed: A new area has been revealed.
LanguageData.AreaRevealedWithMechanoids: A new area has been revealed. It contains ancient, hostile mechanoids.
LanguageData.RoofCollapsed: A roof has collapsed because it was too far from any support.
LanguageData.RelatedPawnInvolvedInQuest: NAME is {0}'s {1}. If NAME dies, {0} will suffer from long-lasting grief. However, if you manage to rescue NAME, {0} will be very happy for a long time.
LanguageData.BirthdayChronological:
It's {0}'s chronological birthday today! Biologically, {1} is {3} years old.

Chronologically, {1} just turned {2}.

Note that since people don't age while in cryptosleep, chronological birthday is separate from biological birthday.
LanguageData.NewDisease: {0} has gotten sick from {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {2} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.NewPartDisease: {0} has gotten sick from {3}. The infection is in HIS {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {2} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.PawnWasFormerlyColonist: {0} was formerly part of your faction.
LanguageData.PawnHasTheseRelationshipsWithColonists: {0} has these relationships with your colonists:
LanguageData.PrisonerRescueTimeout: The camp will disappear after {0} days. If you miss this opportunity, you may never hear from {1} again.
LanguageData.AncientShrineWarning: As {0} draws near the ancient wall, a sense of foreboding overcomes HIM. HECAP isn't sure why, but HE feels that this dusty structure may contain great danger.
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterFromDamage: A {0} is attacking after being harmed!
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterFromTaming: A {0} is attacking due to a taming attempt!
LanguageData.AnimalManhunterOthers: Other {0} nearby have also become enraged!
LanguageData.LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {0} has accidentally sprung a trap and taken damage from it.
LanguageData.LetterLeaderChanged: {0} is no longer {3} of {1}.\n\nThe new {3} is {2}.
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsRaidEnemy:
There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of {0}.

Keep in mind that even though they are related, they will still attack each other because of their bad factions relations.

These people are:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsRaidFriendly: There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of friendly {0}:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsNeutralGroup: There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradeShip: The orbital trader is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithSettlement: The settlement is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithOtherCarava: The caravan is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LanguageData.RelationshipAppendedLetterTextColonist: NAME has a relationship with a colonist. HECAP is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.RelationshipAppendedLetterTextPrisoner: NAME has a relationship with one of your prisoners. HECAP is {0}'s {1}.
LanguageData.LetterAffair: {0}, married to {1}, has begun an affair with {2}.
LanguageData.LetterNewLovers: {0} and {1} have come together and are now lovers.
LanguageData.LetterNoLongerLovers: {0} and {1} are no longer in a relationship.
LanguageData.LetterAcceptedProposal: {1} has accepted {0}'s marriage proposal.\n\nAt some point in the coming days or seasons, they will have their marriage ceremony and invite all the colonists. Consider placing a marriage spot if you want to control where the ceremony occurs.
LanguageData.LetterRejectedProposal: {1} has rejected {0}'s marriage proposal. {0} is going to be unhappy about this.
LanguageData.LetterBondedAnimalDied: {0}, bonded to {1}, has died. It will affect {1}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterNamedBondedAnimalDied: {0} named {1}, bonded to {2}, has died. It will affect {2}'s mood.
LanguageData.LetterBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{1}
LanguageData.LetterNamedBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} named {1} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{2}
LanguageData.LetterNewParty: {0} is throwing a party! Everyone who goes will gain joy and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
LanguageData.LetterNewlyAddicted: {0} has developed an addiction to {1}.\n\nHECAP now has a need for {1}, visible on HIS Needs tab. HECAP will automatically consume the drug to fulfil HIS need. If HE cannot get any {1}, HE will go into withdrawal.
LanguageData.LetterFormedCaravan: Your caravan has formed and awaits orders on the world map.
LanguageData.LetterAllCaravanColonistsDied: All members of your caravan have died.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredAmbushMap: {0} has arrived at the ambush site.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBase: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBaseBecameHosti: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.\n\nBecause of your hostile approach, {2} is now hostile to you.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseDefeated: The enemy outpost {0} has been destroyed.\n\nYou have {1} to collect items before your colonists reform the caravan.
LanguageData.LetterFactionBaseDefeated_FactionDestroy: This was the last base of {0}, which means the faction does not exist anymore.
LanguageData.LetterPawnsLostDueToMapCountdown: Some of your animals or prisoners were left behind in the wilderness:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.LetterDefeatAllEnemiesQuestCompleted: You have defeated the enemy outpost!\n\nThe payment from {0} has arrived, and faction relations have improved by {1}.
LanguageData.LetterFoundPreciousLump: Your long-range mineral scanner has found a lump of precious resources nearby.\n\nWe don't know who or what - if anything - might be guarding it.
LanguageData.LetterSleepingMechanoids: There are a few sleeping hostile mechanoids in this area.\n\nThe mechanoids may or may not wake up when you approach them, so beware.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Disaster:
The talks were a disaster. The delegates barely got past their initial greetings before the discussion broke down into insults and recriminations.

After your caravan departed early, {0} from {1} caught up with it and attacked!

Relations with {1}: {2}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Backfire: The talks have backfired. Despite trading some pleasantries, the delegates made no progress on substantive issues, and multiple statements were interpreted as insults.\n\nRelations with {0}: {1}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_TalksFlounder: The talks floundered. Delegates managed to communicate clearly and with basic respect, but were not able to make progress on any genuine issues.\n\nRelations with {0} remain unchanged.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Success: The talks were a success. The delegates reached new mutual understanding on several substantial issues.\n\nRelations with {0} have improved by {1}.
LanguageData.LetterPeaceTalks_Triumph:
The talks were a great triumph! Delegates connected quickly on a personal level and came to truly see each others' perspective on the most difficult issues of the day.

Relations with {0} have improved by {1}.

As your caravan departed, {0} offered you a gift: {2}.
LanguageData.PeaceTalksSocialXPGain: {0}, your negotiator, has gained {1} social experience.
LanguageData.LetterRunWildMentalBreak: {0} has decided to leave your faction and live with the animals.
LanguageData.LetterCatatonicMentalBreak: {0} has a catatonic breakdown which will last several days.
